roleset.name: progress; make one's way; route
roleset.note: WAY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on LVB-ON. (from way.01-n)

example.name: way-n: both args, LVB
example.text: Another close ally is Ruth Messinger , a Manhattan city councilwoman , [some of whose programs , such as commercial rent control]-1 , *T*-1 have made their way into Mr. Dinkins 's position papers .

roleset.name: manner, course of action
roleset.note: NAME-V NOTES: Added by Julia for BOLT

role.descr: entity having a manner of doing

example.name: way-n
example.text: I'm going to do this the hard way.

roleset.name: discourse function: by the way
roleset.note: NAME-V NOTES: Added by Julia for BOLT

roleset.name: involving some number of participants
roleset.note: WAY-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

role.descr: thing split some number of ways

example.name: (two) way-j
example.text: This wasn’t what I’d call a two-way street

example.name: (multi-hundred) way-j
example.text: Both my lineups ended up in at least (I stopped counting) a multi-hundred-way tie right on the cash line of 123.

roleset.name: in progress
roleset.note: UNDER_WAY-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: under_way-j
example.text: A U.S. F-15E jet fighter also went down early Monday and a search *ICH*-1 was under way [for its two - man crew]-1 , the military announced Tuesday .
